title: Stories PodChats: Disney Bracket 1
description:
Today we’re sharing an episode of Stories Podchats with a fun game for you to play along at home. We will be questing to find the best Disney movie of all time using the ultimate gauntlet of contest, the bracket. Each Disney movie has been randomly entered and the bracket has been built, follow along while we cover round one on the road to the best Disney movie of all time. 

For more episodes of Stories Podchats, and for ad-free episodes, access to all of our ebooks, or to receive a thank you in a future episode, you can check us out on patreon.com/stories.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
